sources.title: 1933 Peter Das Mädchen Von Der Tankstelle( Franziska Gaal, Otto Walburg, Felix Bressart)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1933. Peter-Das Mädchen von der Tankstelle  u.a mit Franziska Gaal und Otto Walburg

metadata.Plot: A 17 year old girl, hustling money as a street musician after being evicted from her family home, is forced to disguise as a boy,is charged with a crime, and causes later confusion due to her double identity.
metadata.Writer: Felix Jackson, Sándor Nádas, János Vaszary
metadata.Actors: Franciska Gaal, Felix Bressart, Friedl Czepa
